meanings.definition: A series of names or items written or printed together in a meaningful grouping.
meanings.sent1: I made a list of all the groceries we need to buy.
meanings.sent2: The teacher read out the list of students who made the honor roll.
meanings.sent3: The list of ingredients for the recipe was so long, it felt like a never-ending scroll.
meanings.sent4: Her list of accomplishments was as impressive as a treasure map leading to success.
meanings.sent5: The list of rules was as clear as a bright, sunny day.

meanings.definition: To write down a series of names or items in a meaningful grouping.
meanings.sent1: Please list all the items you want to sell on the online marketplace.
meanings.sent2: She listed her favorite movies in a notebook.
meanings.sent3: When asked to list his strengths, he jokingly included 'eating a whole pizza in one sitting'.
meanings.sent4: The detective listed all the possible suspects in his notebook like a diligent investigator.
meanings.sent5: He listed his goals for the year like a captain plotting a course for a voyage.
